control.visible: [Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(musicvideos) | Container.Content(sets) | Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(episodes) | Container.Content(songs) | Container.Content(albums) | Container.Content(years)]

![Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(musicvideos) | Container.Content(sets) | Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(genres) | Window.IsActive(musicplaylist) | Window.IsActive(music)]

Skin.HasSetting(nowidevideocase) + [Container.Content(movies) + SubString(skin.string(widemovies.art),poster) | Container.Content(musicvideos) | Container.Content(sets)] | Container.Content(tvshows) + SubString(skin.string(widetvshows.art),poster) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(genres)
